ComicInfo.Summary: The most disturbed horror series of all time continues with an all-new seven-issue series written by David (Crossed: Family Values) Lapham! Harold Lorre carefully orchestrates the lives of those around him. To aid him in his twisted quest, and to satiate his twisted desires. Lorre might be the most evil man alive. Join us as Lapham and artist Raulo (Capt Swing) Caceres descend into a story about the worst aspects of human behavior, a tale of unspeakable evils, violent assaults on both mind and body, and of longing for death and the sweet release it will bring. When civilization crumbles in one terrifying moment; when people are gleefully breaking into unthinkable acts of violence all around you; when everyone you love has died screaming in agony: What do you do? There is no help. There is no hope. There is no escape. There are only the Crossed. Crossed: Psychopath #3 is available with a Regular cover by Jacen Burrows, a Wraparound cover by series artist Raulo Caceres, a Torture cover by Matt Martin, and a special rare Red Crossed retailer incentive.
